storyInfo: Amiya and Logos confront the Sanguinarch of Vampires, who, enraged at the increasing weakness of those chosen by the Crown, decides to abandon it beyond the edge of civilization. After a challenging battle, the Sanguinarch falls from the Feranmut skeleton.

attributes.text: Blood rain falls incessantly, as if it will never stop.
\nLogos and Amiya's shoulders have been soaked red by the rain.
\nThe white-haired Vampire, however, seems to stroll casually under the rain, completely spotless.

attributes.content: Look at the sorry state of yourselves.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Lost in confusion, losing sight of what matters.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Even if no one answers your cries, you can't waste the stage you've been given, don't waste your chance at a grand farewell.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: 'I state it, therefore, it is prescribed.'
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: 'The wind and rain cease, deprived of the right to flow.'
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.text: The moment the words are spoken, the blood rain freezes in midair.
\nLike curtains, like stars, it refracts the sorrow of the sea, the brilliance of the moons.
\nThe Sanguinarch squints, seemingly unsurprised by the incantation of the Lord of the Banshees. Rather, it is as if he is appreciating a piece of art drawn between heaven and earth.

attributes.content: You've halted the surging? Impressive. Blood pauses at your command.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: But—I am its master.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.text: The suspended beads of blood suddenly burst in the air, splattering anything they can reach.

attributes.content: The knell will decay, the order will wear, no?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: If you so disdain your noble blood, I might as well extract it and return it to your mother, Banshee.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: She will play for you a mournful whistle.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Amiya!
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.text: The Vampire only gives Amiya a momentary opportunity, but it is more than enough.
\nAmiya's palm presses against the Vampire's body, sticky blood burning her palm.

attributes.content: Is this your blood?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Heated by Arts, heated by your talent.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But the hot blood I've seen—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: —has all been for the sake of resistance, for the sake of life.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And those people, their blood is much hotter than yours.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: Black lines burst from Amiya's palm, piercing through the Vampire's body.

attributes.content: Hngh.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Amiya, fall back!
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: You didn't get his vitals!
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Oh how cold, King of Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: A monarch of such little grace you are.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Sanguinarch of Vampires, Prince of the Crimson Court, your offspring fill every battlefield the Sarkaz touch.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You proclaim to them that slaughter and conquest are the ancient traditions of the Vampires.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You've shaped your court into what it is today. You've made the people see all Vampires as nothing more than twisted creatures of desire like yourself.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But the Vampires I know are not like you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They haven't gone mad like you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They've only managed to conceal their desires, conditioned to deeply by this age in which they have no home.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Some choose to bow down to the invaders, and I pity them.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: No, that's not it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: How do you interpret the blood that your court stands for?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The sufferings of the Sarkaz need no elucidation. All Sarkaz, even those who submit to you, inevitably know the taste of blood.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Overturned in dark alleys, intercepted in dark forests, sometimes a throat is cut, sometimes cold daggers are thrust between ribs.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: It awakens the siblings, who now know the cost of submission, and they come to rebel until they too are covered in the blood of their enemies.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: How pitiful.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Kill or be killed, this is the cycle of blood that the Sarkaz carry.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Is that how you define the meaning of blood? A cycle?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The first time any of us felt blood on our skin, wasn't it... when we were born from our mothers?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Blood is the foundation of human life, heritage passed down on umbilical cords, inevitable stumbles when exploring the outside world, and wounds that will surely heal.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But you see it only as a synonym for torment and death.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Your obsession makes you bloodthirsty.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You, with all your arrogance and pride, lead them to believe that this is the path the Sarkaz should take, the things they should do.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I reject you, Sanguinarch.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I reject your actions, your words, and your court.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ahahahahah! What is this I'm hearing?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You, an outblood, reject me?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: A mere crown has inflated you to what... King of Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.text: The blood sea churns, its waves cover the moons.
\nCrimson removes all other colors.

attributes.content: I don't care what I am, or what I'm called.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I only know what I need to do.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: The Prince stops moving for a moment.
\nA voice echoes in his mind.

attributes.content: Is this how you manipulate the King's power, Cautus?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Will you share some profound words? Try to shake me with shallow emotion?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You're welcome to try.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.text: Shake? No.
\nThis is a rejection.
The rolling of the waves slows, together with the moonlight.

attributes.content: I reject you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I reject you, the way you reduce the King, the Sarkaz, and Kazdel to concepts of power and tradition.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I reject you, how you entrust the future to the past, entrust life to slaughter.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Theresa, the King, the Chancellor, the leader of Babel, she showed everyone a path.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Maybe that path is too idealistic, maybe her promises won't bear the thousands of years of hatred of the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But that's not now, not your choice.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You'd laugh at my weakness? Say it's not my place to talk about the Sarkaz with you?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Or you'd mock Logos for not making use of the blood you 'awakened' just now?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh, King of Sarkaz... You eavesdrop on my thoughts? Is that your ability?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Then of course you know what I'm going to say.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I do.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But we've never said that the Sarkaz should give up their resistance. We've never said that suffering is justified.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: On the contrary—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Those rebels who awaken from their suffering and hardship, from the abyss of hatred—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They will be much, much stronger than you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The lost homeland of the Sarkaz is not in the history you keep looking back to, an eon ago.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It can't be a slogan, or fantasy, or symbol.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's right here, where the Sarkaz came from.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: In the city called Kazdel, where so many real people live, people that you've only condemned to a void of ideas.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You've imagined the present from the past, and the real future can never be born.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's time to stop, Vampire.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: Amiya's ring shatters, sending splinters flying.
\nCold anger burns within Amiya as she scrutinizes the enemy before her.
\nShe thought her anger would rise, burning like a fire that could scorch the ocean.
But no, that's not what's happening.
\nAmiya feels more than just anger, also an intense... sadness.
The Sarkaz, a people who have lost their homeland.
\nYes, they believe that it is only through violence and war that they can reclaim all they've lost.
\nIt's easy to blame them, with cliche words of morality, justice, and kindness.
\nWords that have been spoken over and over again, even as the war continues, and hatred spreads.
Because that is how this world treats them.
\nThis world has imposed on them violence and war.
\nSo then, what's wrong with an eye for an eye? Where is the crime in blood for blood?
Every King of Sarkaz operates on those principles, so the war never stops.
\nThis must be broken, but how... how can this system be broken?

attributes.content: Even Theresa failed. What do you think you are?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.text: Yes, even she failed.

attributes.content: That's why Theresa needs me. The Doctor and Dr. Kal'tsit need me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And that's why I'm here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I, as the revenant called me, as you called me, as so many Sarkaz believe me to be—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The outblood—the weak—King of Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Stand down.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: The obsidian decree transforms into the judgment of the King, stabbing into the scorched blood.
\nThe thick red finally dissipates—
The Vampire takes a few steps back, raising his hand to wipe away the blood that flows from his nose and mouth.
\nHis body is damaged, and his white clothes are at last stained with blood.

attributes.content: You can't fight anymore, Sanguinarch.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's time for this battle to end.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: King of Sarkaz, won't you grant me that vision of emptiness?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Don't you want to peer into my thoughts, see my sorrows and pain?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You can reprimand me, reject me. Countless Sarkaz believe this is the power of the King.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You say I've corrupted my court, but what about you?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Oh King, the Sarkaz take your direction, your path. My people follow you, expecting you to well exploit their flesh and blood, their lives, and their souls.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Their blind faith is ridiculous.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I sneer at the King's comfort, but... I have seen it.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: My elder brother was a King of Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Hah, what a lofty title, what a transcendent role—
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: He was looked to as the leader of the Sarkaz, our guiding light.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: He was a natural savior, the one who would pull us out of our misery.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: But what was the reality?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: What kind of people has the Black Crown chosen?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: In the beginning, the King of Sarkaz was indeed magnificent, the Diαblos walked the path of punishment, the Goliaths roared the fearless calamity—
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: But they found themselves betrayed by the cowardly, sold out by the selfish.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: This is our curse.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: 'The King killed the King.'
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Succession to this crown often comes with death.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The vile always prevail.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: As such, the Crown was besmirched by shortsighted fools.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: The weak began to appear among the Kings.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: They were narrow-minded, focused on toying with the power the held in their hands—They became no better than the hypocritical lords among the Elders and Ancients.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: The power they stole from others clouded their vision. The focus of my people's faith turned from fearless warriors to vermin hiding in their palaces.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: They even forgot the shame borne by the name 'Sarkaz'!
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: But the Crown continued to make its laughable choices, right up to my brother.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I thought surely he would be the hero we had waited for!
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: He, on the other hand, had the audacity to say to me that the Sarkaz could no longer afford to continue to war, that it would take generations to rebuild Kazdel...
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Even the skeleton beneath our feet knows that the Kazdel we should rebuild was never meant to be a city. And that the 'King of Sarkaz' should be the one to stand before them all.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: How can a man like that deserve to hold a single drop of Teekaz blood within his body?!
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Do you see it, King of Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I see... a bloody civil war.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The carpets of the palace are soaked red.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I see a... Vampire, lying in the arms of another Vampire.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The legend of 'The Toppled Blood Prince'.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: He died in a civil war. You're his kin, did you fight in the war?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No! Of course not! 'Did I fight?'
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I shattered the Crown myself!
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I remember it like it was yesterday. My hand pierced his chest. The limpid Teekaz blood danced on my fingertip, finally entering my veins.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: He turned his head to look at me, grabbing my clothes... The 'King of Sarkaz' showed his illusory vision to his murderer before he died, the vision that should have been bestowed as an honor.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: In the vision, I saw... I witnessed, peace.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: As you said, Cautus, blood is not synonymous with death. I stood in the valley, watching a quiet village, a doctor laughing as he spoke, stitching up wounds for the injured.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: An injured man tells the doctor that his quarry was particularly ferocious, but he eventually won out. In the courtyard hangs the freshly harvested beastmeat.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: ...And the doctor is me.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: But this makes me uncontrollably angry.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: How tragic, how meaningless, how shameful! My brother actually believed that this false 'peace' could deceive me? He was horrifically wrong!
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: He thought I was blinded by hatred? No, I know what peace is. And that's exactly why I feel so restless!
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: We long to see the great and powerful, true Teekaz!
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I absorbed my brother's blood into my body, and I watched as the Black Crown vanished before my eyes—
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: But you did not ascend to the throne of the 'King of Sarkaz'.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: And I do not regret that. If it could choose a formidable leader, I would be genuinely delighted.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: But this Crown disappoints me time and time again. Each time I am more disappointed.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: My brother's successor was a wandering vagrant. The next was a lumberjack. If it weren't for the records kept by the Confessarii, these people would not be remembered at all.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Later, a King who ruled Kazdel was killed by the monster called Kal'tsit in the sight of the coalition army.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Then came Theresa and Theresis.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: They were impressive, but also frustrating. Theresa, immersed in her fantasies, wasted her strength, much like my... weak elder brother.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: And her successor... turned out to be a Cautus, an outblood.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Things being what they are, the Crown's choices being so absurd, even as its existence brings such humiliating hope to my people—
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I would rather bury it beyond the reach of civilization. I will let it be truly lost, forgotten to history.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You're still struggling.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Amiya, don't give him a chance.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: You are weakening too. However tarnished the Crown may be, its weight is not something an infantile Cautus could bear.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: It seems the Confessarii so eager to manipulate the Crown are going to blather some nonsense at me.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Take another look around, Cautus. If you die, there will be no more 'successors'.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Or maybe you'd place your crown on the moons?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.text: The flowing blood surges toward the Sanguinarch's body.
\nThe white-haired Sarkaz stands proudly once again.

attributes.content: What...? How can he still fight?!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The King's Arts should have pierced his body, leaving it unable to regenerate!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: He is using blood to fill the holes in his flesh, using it to mend his wounds.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: He's a marionette now.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: You've become more proficient in the use of the King's power, Cautus.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: But all your admonitions, warnings, judgments, and proclamations are nothing but jokes.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Ignorant little rabbit, the crown over your head represents no responsibility or authority.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: King of Sarkaz, hah. I mock not only your foolishness, but that of the King.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: And that of the Crown itself.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.text: The once vibrant red that filled the entire space no longer exists.
\nOnly a bit of crimson oozes from the Sanguinarch's pupils.

attributes.content: When the Sarkaz lose the King on which they're so dependent, then perhaps they will wake up from this shameful dream of a coming salvation.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I accede to your statement, that those awakening from a dream will be much more powerful.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: And that is why you cannot defeat me.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: How can the fallen consciousness of the Sarkaz resist me, who once carried the blood of the Teekaz?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: The polluted cannot defile the pure, the impure cannot touch the limpid.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Your origin lies in the Teekaz, a long line you can only climb!
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: We are the rebels!
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: 'I decree, therefore, I correct.'
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: 'Blood and fire extinguished, face to doom.'
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Look out, Logos!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: A touch of crimson appears from nothing.
\nThe space once occupied by the Banshee is replaced by blood.

attributes.content: *cough*!
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: His blood, it's... affecting me.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Several times stronger than those Arts Circles—
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Yes, thanks to you, I have also shed my blood here.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: And therefore—
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: This place is now part of Kazdel.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Who would have thought that as much as anyone assumed they knew the full length and breadth of this great land...
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: The boundaries of our home are still expanding, even in this time and place.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Sarkaz, my self-proclaimed Sarkaz kin!
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: March with your blood, carry on with that which will never betray you, the boon of your blood!
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I will take you back to the origin of all of this.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: And that is—
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.text: A shadow pierces his chest.
\nThreads of blood holding him together are severed in an instant.

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Sorry, Sarkaz boons don't do much for me.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Bunny!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You *Sarkaz profanity* aren't Sarkaz! Hop to it! Weaken his binds!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: That's what I'm doing! His Arts are even... crazier than I imagined!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can barely hear his thoughts anymore, there's... there's only red... all red...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I've almost... got it!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Another outblood... an unexpected development.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: The scent of your blood... you're Caprinae?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Such a dull disguise... let's have your blood suffocate you.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: ...Urk!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Do you think such crude Arts would let you kill a King of the Sarkaz Royal Court?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Of course not.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.text: A heavy sword points directly at the Sanguinarch's head.

attributes.content: You can't call something as cliche as slaughter an 'awakening', Sanguinarch.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You're still wandering in hatred and destruction, you've never left the 'abyss'.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You're the ones who are still sleeping.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: —Vile traitors—
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: King of Sarkaz!
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Now!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Before he recovers, knock him off the skeleton!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: An elegy begins to play.
The wailing of the Banshee weaves into a mournful melody, and the waves beneath his feet sing a solemn song.
\nA steady male voice harmonizes with the sound of the bells, with moonlight as his prose.
The bone whistle sounds itself before it is played.
\nIts distant howl, traversing time itself, strikes the Crimson Court.

attributes.content: The moment I took my throne, the knells were already tied to my fate.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: None of us can escape.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: But what the elegy mourns will not be your corpse.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: It will be all of our connections.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.text: The Sanguinarch continues to struggle, blood gushing from his fingertips, like claws carving deep scratches into the bleached skull of the Feranmut.
\nHis body disintegrates into the dirge, only to reform in blood.
\nHe is the icon of blood, and as long as there is blood, he will continue to fight.

attributes.content: I—will not—Banshee—
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Amiya, join me.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Explore the strings of the elegy. Seek out the origin of the Banshee.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Look at me. Look to the wails you once covered your ears to avoid.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: We must end him here.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: I'll try!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: The Banshee's song echoes again, and the ancient knells seem to materialize, deterring the creeping blood.
\nThe Vampire still rises.
\nAfter a moment, a rather tender feminine voice joins the harmonic dirge.
A proclamation of death? A sentence of rejection?
\nNo, not only. The melody carries a kind of timidity, and lingering... sadness.
\nAs the blood cools, the moonlight changes. The hatred of the Sarkaz is not unreasonable, and the Vampire's vengeance is not unreasonable.
\nHowever, this is by no means the promised future. Can the survivors have a future, on scorched earth?
No!
\nWhat do those siblings... actually see?

attributes.content: Banshee! Listen!
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You have still—Accepted your blood, my boon—
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You have not yet... defeated yourself!
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.text: What echoes here is no longer an elegy.
\nIt is only a sigh.
\nA sigh that makes him uneasy.
The heat of the explosion and the weight of the sword make the Sanguinarch feel powerless for the first time.
\nHe looks at the small, ever so small, King of Sarkaz.
He looks at that Cautus, so inferior to the Sarkaz. He looks at the Black Crown, such a meaningless curse.
\nThe history and illusions he trampled on, the bloodline and inheritance, the revenge and unrivaled power, all suddenly disappear.
He feels a void beneath his feet.
A figure in white falls from the skeleton.

attributes.content: Ridiculous... even the myriad souls mock me.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Lord of the Banshees, and... King of Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You keep these deserters around who ignore the past, and in the end, you don't even dare to act yourselves.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Oh... the vile always prevail.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: This is indeed our curse.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: The outblood King has executed me?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: The King of Sarkaz resounds with the knells. But you don't know how strong the ties of blood are. You try to judge...
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Heh, in the end, you did use the power within your blood!
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Two elegiac singers offered me a dirge at the same time—
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: When the time came, you could not resist the instinct within your blood that comprises all that you are.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Did you really kill me? No.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I have returned the Teekaz blood to where it belongs...
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Go and see, go to Londinium—
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: (Whispered Sarkaz) I'll be waiting for you behind the curtain of ruin.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires
